title: Easter Bunny's Amazing Day
description: Meet the Risen Jesus with an amazing bunny―and his amazing tale―in this beautifully illustrated hardcover children’s book. Children will learn Jesus’ friendship and comfort through the eyes of a timid bunny rabbit who experiences the love and joy that Jesus brings first hand. A new, enhanced version will be available Easter 2014, and these first edition copies are going fast! Easter Bunny's Amazing Day is sure to be a family favorite every Easter.
author: Cathy Gilmore
